attributes.action: fund a CCTV in Bank Quay station, Warrington
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Even the police themselves have asked for this to British Rail - and nothing has been done - the reason I know this is because I had my car stolen ... and the next one was vandalised there ... are you really serious about crime and justice ??? Does someone need to be killed or an old lady mugged before anything is done ???
